    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Kiri Jõuluvanale: teksti koostamine, 1. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">A letter to Santa Clause</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Zeichen zu Weihnachtsmann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une lettre au père noël</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma letra a Papai Noel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lettera al Babbo Natale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επιστολή στην πρόταση Santa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una carta a Papá Noel</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Kiri Jõuluvanale: sobiva adressaadi ja kirjutaja-rolli valik ja kirja kirjutamine. Ideed kasutatavad ka paberil.</string>
            <string language="en">A letter to Santa Clause: writing the letter choosing the right addressee and the role of the writer. Also usable as a printout.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">aabitsaperiood</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Zeichen zu Weihnachtsmann: Schreiben 
des Briefs, der den rechten Empfänger und die Rolle des Verfassers 
wählt. Auch verwendbar als PRINTOUT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une lettre au père noël : inscription de 
la lettre choisissant le destinataire droit et le rôle de l'auteur. 
En outre utilisable comme impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma letra a Papai Noel: escrevendo a letra 
que escolhe o destinatário direito e o papel do escritor. 
Também usable como um impresso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lettera al Babbo Natale: scrittura 
della lettera che sceglie il destinatario di destra ed il ruolo del 
produttore. Inoltre utilizzabile come tabulato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επιστολή στην πρόταση Santa: γράψιμο της 
επιστολής που επιλέγει το σωστό παραλήπτη και το ρόλο του 
συγγραφέα. Επίσης χρησιμοποιήσιμος ως έντυπο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una carta a Papá Noel: escribir la letra 
que elige el destinatario adecuado y el papel del programa de 
escritura. También usable como informe de ejecución.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela Básica</string>

          <keyword>
